price: Kuma waɗanda suka nĩsanci Shaiɗannu ga bauta musu, kuma suka mai da al'amari ga Allah, sunã da bushãra. To, ka bãyar da bushãra ga bãyiNa.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجۡتَنَبُواْ ٱلطَّٰغُوتَ أَن يَعۡبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰۚ فَبَشِّرۡ عِبَادِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ij'tanabū al-ṭāghūta an yaʿbudūhā wa-anābū ilā al-lahi lahumu al-bush'rā fabashir ʿibādi
